Class Dragon.Flames

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • Dragon.Flames
  • Enclosing class:
    Dragon

    static class Dragon.Flames
extends Actor
    A class representing the blaze a Dragon can start.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dragon.Flames()
      Create a new, red blaze, that has not yet consumed any of its fuel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Allows a fire to keep track of time's passage; a flame object burns for a while, then stops.
